subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
Sustainable Living
Alternative and Renewable Energy
lead_paragraph: For the last five years, the club’s overriding mission has been to become the self-proclaimed greenest soccer team in the world, at least off the field.
snippet: For the last five years, the club’s overriding mission has been to become the self-proclaimed greenest soccer team in the world, at least off the field.
